name: Only One Arrow
description:
WASD - movement
Shift - dash
Mouse - aim
Hold and release LMB - draw string and shoot arrow
Hold and release RMB - if you have any special attacks unlocked, you can use them with this; note that you need an unbroken combo of 4 to use one (the combo meter will glow yellow

Only One Arrow is a top-down shooter where you only have one projectile. You need to retrieve it from where it landed to be able to shoot again, while dodging enemies. Every several kills you're awarded with a perk that can change the way you play. Can you reach 200 kills without dying?

Unfortunately some upgrades do not work. Sorry :/. Happens when you make a game in 48 hours.

Made by Leo Scott, Ilya Semyonov, Bluzi, Westley Wong, and Patrick Sayers

Made for GMTK 2019 game jam: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019
